item.title: Find a better name for the "AdvancedMapViewer" application
item.description:
From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on November 24, 2010 09:53:08
The current name "AdvancedMapViewer" serves only as a placeholder for our main demo and testing activity. I will be happy if we can find a more elegant name for this application that still represents its purpose.
All ideas and suggestions are welcome!
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=48

item.contents:
